name: AFWAS
description:
In AFWAS   🍽 you play to achieve humans greatest pleasure: not having to do the dishes.

Instead, just stack everything around your kitchen. Surely this plate will fit in with the others, and this pan needs to soak first anyway. Oh, and this spoon can easily go between all the cups, right?  🥄

Future-you can deal with it when they really need to, and besides, who actually needs to be able to reach their sink or fridge? Just order pizza and use the box  🍕.

Are you the best procrastinator?  👀 See if you can get the highest tower and beat the other lazy bums, just don't drop the dishes on the ground!  🥇

Tools
  • Juicebox game engine (Custom, available soon-ish!)
  • Visual Studio for development
  • Asesprite for art
  • Logic Pro with minibit plug-in for music and FX
Team

Made with 💖  by:

  • Thom Zeilstra | Programming, Networking, Art & Game design.
  • Mathijs Koning | Music, Art & Game design.
